newsitem.title: USA: Claire's Stores reschedules annual meeting.
newsitem.headline: Claire's Stores reschedules annual meeting.

text.p: Claire's Stores Inc said Wednesday that it has postponed its annual meeting from June 2 to June 16 because some of its shareholders were omitted inadvertently when the required proxy material was mailed.
The meeting will be held June 16 at 9:30 a.m. in the Kennedy Room at The New York Palace Hotel, 455 Madison Avenue, New York City.
Claire's Stores specializes in one-stop shopping for teens' fashion accessories and owns and operates stores in 49 states, the Caribbean, Canada, Japan and The United Kingdom.
